Download TIGER shapes for Roads

Source: R/roads.R
tt_roads.Rd

Download TIGER shapes for Roads

Usage

tt_roads(state, county, year = 2024)

Arguments

state

FIPS, postal codes, or full names of states.

county

FIPS codes or full names of counties. Optional.

year

Integer year. Required. 2000 and 2010-2024 are currently supported.

Value

sf data.frame

Examples

# Wrapped in try due to false positive 304 errors
try(tt_roads("DE")) # downloads slow on CRAN
#> Simple feature collection with 33352 features and 4 fields
